titles: Absalom's rebellion as it is recorded in the 2. Sam. chap. 15, 16, 17, 18, & 19, with some observations upon the severall passages thereof, too [sic] fit a patterne for the present times, whereinto we are fallen.
notes: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
